title: TryHackMe
desc: TryHackMe is an online platform that teaches Cybersecurity through hands-on virtual labs. Whether you are an expert or beginner, learn through a virtual room structure to understand theoretical and practical security elements. Learn, practice and complete! Get hands-on and practise your skills in a real-world environment by completing guided and interactive tasks. This platform also offers an awesome king of the hill style multiplayer mode.
